All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    The Activity class represents an activity that can be performed by the player.
    Activity.ActivityType
    Type of the activity.
    ActivityScreen
    The ActivityScreen class represents the screen where the player decides whether to perform a specific activity.
    CharacterSelectionScreen
    This class represents the screen where the player selects their character.
    EndGameScreen
    This class represents the end game screen displayed when the player completes the game.
    ErrorScreen
    This class represents an error screen displayed when the player encounters certain errors during gameplay, such as running out of time or energy.
    GameScreen
    This class represents the main game screen where the player can freely roam around the map, interact with activities, and manage their character's energy and time.
    HeslingtonHustle
    The HeslingtonHustle class represents the main game class for the Heslington Hustle game.
    HeslingtonHustle.GameState
    Enum representing the game's state.
    HowToPlayScreen
    This class represents the screen that provides instructions on how to play the game.
    MainMenuScreen
    The MainMenuScreen class represents the main menu screen of the game.
    NewDayScreen
    NewDayScreen class represents the screen displayed at the beginning of a new day in the game.
    PauseScreen
    PauseScreen class represents the screen displayed when the game is paused.
    Player
    The Player class represents the player character in the game.
    Stats
    The Stats class represents the statistics of the game, including activities performed, study sessions, and daily progress.
